name: MechTek
description:
MechTek is a 2D action shooter game made in the Godot engine. Customize your mech and fight endless waves of enemies!

The game is currently in a free bug testing period. If you download the game please report any bugs you may find. I will try to fix them as best I can. After the period, the game will no longer be free. However users who got the game during the bug testing period will not have to pay.

Features:

  • 3 Different Maps!
  • Loads of different weapons to choose from!
  • Full mech customization!
  • Endless wave survival!

Please report any bugs you might find while playing! Also please, please let me know if my Mac package is correct. I do not have a Mac to test it on nor am I familiar with exporting games to that platform.

Getting started:

Launch the game, and go to the customization menu. The default setup is my recommended setup but you can change it if you want. Click back then click play, you can then choose a map to play.

Controls:

WASD - move around

Left Click - shoot your left gun

Right Click - shoot your right gun

Escape - pause, unpause
